Sainik School Goalpara Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 08 Ward Boy, Matron Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 08, 2025, 11:12 IST
 Sainik School
 8 Jobs |  Posted On : 08-Aug-2025 |  Assam |  Salary : 18,000 to 44,900




FOLLOW

The Sainik School Goalpara has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 08 Ward Boy, Matron, Quarter Master, TGT, and LDC Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the deadline. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, 10th pass, and Diploma can apply for the Sainik School Goalpara Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Assam.

Sainik School Goalpara Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Quarter Master	01	Any Degree
TGT	02	Any Degree, Any Degree
LDC	01	10th pass
PEM	01	Diploma
Matron	01	10th pass
Ward Boy	02

Sainik School Goalpara Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 50 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

Sainik School Goalpara Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Written Test.
Skill Test.
Interview.

Sainik School Goalpara Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee 

For SC/ST/OBC candidates: Rs. 200/-.
For General candidates: Rs. 300/-.

Sainik School Goalpara Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 18,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 44,900/- per month.
How to Apply for the Sainik School Goalpara Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the Sainik School Goalpara Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

Principal, Sainik School Goalpara, PO: Rajapara, District: Goalpara, Assam-783133.

Important Dates:

Starting date	22-07-2025
Closing date	01-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
